name: Employment Specialists of Maine Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Employment Specialists of Maine Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness provider based in Augusta, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.2M in Medicaid payments across 49K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
